definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: cold waters to a thirsty soul, so [is] good news from a far country.
sentences.chinese: 有好消息從遠方來，就如拿涼水給口渴的人喝。

sentences.english: The beauty of JiuZhaigou attracts tourists from the Europe and far afield.
sentences.chinese: 九寨溝的美景吸引了來自歐洲乃至更遠方的遊客。

sentences.english: The jet soared away into the distance.
sentences.chinese: 噴射機不停高飛進入遠方。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a remote meter -reading system based on CATV broad band network.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於有線電視寬帶網的遠方抄表系統。

sentences.english: We heard the distant roll of the big guns.
sentences.chinese: 咱們聽見遠方的隆隆的大炮聲。

sentences.english: Flee, get you far off, dwell deep, O ye inhabitants of Hazor, saith the LORD;
sentences.chinese: 耶和華說，夏瑣的居民哪，要逃奔遠方，住在深密處。

sentences.english: She is like the merchant ships, bringing her food from afar.
sentences.chinese: 她好像商船從遠方運糧來。

sentences.english: Road in the distance, I still trials and hardships.
sentences.chinese: 路在遠方，我還在風雨兼程。

sentences.english: Last month I found myself climbing a steep mountain in a distant country.
sentences.chinese: 上個月我發現我自己在一個遠方的國度攀登一座險峯。

sentences.english: I walk slowly, like one who comes from so far away he doesn't expect to arrive.
sentences.chinese: 我款款而行，有如來自遠方而不存到達希望的人。

sentences.english: In the cold, late autumn, I miss you again from afar.
sentences.chinese: 在這淒冷的深秋，我又想起了遠方的你。

sentences.english: Across the plain, the road extends far.
sentences.chinese: 道路穿越平原，向遠方延伸。

sentences.english: The hoot owl continued its call in the distance, and the night breeze rustled the leaves in the trees.
sentences.chinese: 貓頭鷹在遠方繼續叫着，晚風吹得樹葉沙沙作響。

sentences.english: On the far farm the armys arms are kept warm by a swarm of bees.
sentences.chinese: 在遠方的農場上，陸軍的武器被一羣蜜蜂保暖。

sentences.english: She stared thoughtfully into the distance.
That friends should come to one from afar, is this not after all delightful?
sentences.chinese: 有朋自遠方來，不亦樂乎？

definition: to hug/to cherish/within the bosom (of the family)/to embrace (also fig. an ideal, aspiration etc)
to circle in the air/to soar
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
